lines.text:
[Seeing Grant in disguise]
Well, it certainly looks as though you can get away with this rajah stuff.
Did you see an Arab running this way?
You don't look like anyone who would shoot a man down in cold blood.
You're right. You better look close, Harris, and you'll see that I'm serious. After all, that time I spent in prison for you, you still think I wouldn't shoot?
All we've got to do is tear this up and we're in soft for the rest of our lives.
None of that, Harris. We're playing this game straight.
Don't be a fool. We can have an entire kingdom at your feet.
You heard what I said. I'm playing this straight.
It is really a curse for a woman.
Women! Ah, I don't trust them! They sell you out!
